question: Dean Jones, who passed away recently, is associated with which field?
explanation:
Commentator and former Australian cricketer Dean Jones passed away, after a massive heart attack in Mumbai.
He was 59 years old. Dean Jones played 52 Tests and 164 ODIs for Australia between 1984 and 1994, after which he entered the field of commentary. He was a part of the Australian team that won the 1987 World Cup.
